text: Kirk Allen (born 3 May 1971) is a Canadian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1992 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Canada Category:Ski jumpers at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Calgary
title: Kirk Allen (ski jumper)
